Title: OIC Denounces Israeli Attacks on Iran as Violation of Sovereignty
Description: Islam Times - The Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) has issued a strong condemnation of recent Israeli airstrikes on Iranian installations, citing them as a clear violation of international law and an infringement on Iranâ€™s sovereignty.

Title: International Union of Muslim Scholars Calls for Supporting Palestinian Nation
Description: Islam Times - The International Union of Muslim Scholars asked Islamic countries to take action to help the Palestinian nation against the crimes of the Israeli regime.

Title: Islamic Scholar Calls Gaza-Israel War An Example of Faith against 'Unbelievers'
Description: Islam Times - An Iranian scholar described the Gaza-Israel war as a confrontation between Islam and non-believers, urging Muslims worldwide to support the resistance front.
